attributes.action: Cross Guns Crossing! Make it safe for all children and students!
attributes.additional_details:
Surely for the safety of the primary school children and students there should be somewhere for them to be able to cross without dodging traffic? 

We have been here a short 6 weeks and there has already been one incident. Do we really need more incidents to show us we need safe places to cross?
attributes.background:
We own a busy pub, on a very busy road. Just behind us is a primary school. On this main road into Wales there is no safe place to cross. On the other side of the road is the main bus stop for college and high school students of Pant, Oswestry. 

We need a Zebra Crossing!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
